qr.permission_list_2: The Hub never uses your camera automatically.
qr.permission_list_3: You'll always get a clear indicator in the top right corner when the camera is active.

about.title: About

privacy_policy.section_1_text: EU2K Hub is the digital center of Európa 2000 Gimnázium, created for students, teachers, and interested parties. Our goal is to make school life simpler and more enjoyable while striving for transparency and security in data handling. This privacy policy details how we handle your personal data.
privacy_policy.section_2_1_1: Authentication data: Basic information from Microsoft, Google, or Apple accounts (name, email address, profile picture)
privacy_policy.section_2_1_2: User profile: Display name, profile pictures, date of birth (optional), account type (student, teacher, parent)
privacy_policy.section_2_1_3: Settings: Language settings, notification settings, messaging settings
privacy_policy.section_2_2_1: Class information: Class name, names and contact information of classmates and teachers
privacy_policy.section_2_2_2: Academic data: Grades, schedule, assignments, homework (if available)
privacy_policy.section_2_2_3: Class profile: Class banner image, description, class statistics
privacy_policy.section_2_3_1: Posts and comments: Content created in YouHub, Event Hub, and other community features
privacy_policy.section_2_3_2: Events: Created or attended events, courses, meetings
privacy_policy.section_2_3_3: Votes: Participation in votes and opinion polls
privacy_policy.section_2_4_1: YouHub: Statistics, schedule, notifications, suggestions, class month performance
privacy_policy.section_2_4_2: Event Hub: Event participation, QR code scans
privacy_policy.section_2_4_5: QR code reading: Timestamps and locations of scanned QR codes
privacy_policy.section_2_5_1: Browser data: Browser type, operating system, device type
privacy_policy.section_2_5_2: Usage data: Page visits, clicks, session information
privacy_policy.section_2_5_3: Local storage: Use of localStorage and sessionStorage to store login status, settings, and other preferences
privacy_policy.section_3_title: 3. How do we use the data?
privacy_policy.section_3_1_2: Operation of school functions (schedule, grades, events)
privacy_policy.section_3_1_3: Provision of community features (posts, comments, events)
privacy_policy.section_3_2_1: Analysis of usage statistics to improve the service
privacy_policy.section_3_3_1: Compliance with GDPR and other data protection laws
privacy_policy.section_3_3_2: Verification of permissions and security measures
privacy_policy.section_3_important: Important: We use data solely for the purposes mentioned above. We do not sell or share them with external companies for commercial purposes.
privacy_policy.section_4_1_4: Firebase Analytics: Usage statistics collection (only with consent)
privacy_policy.section_4_1_text: Data is stored in the Europe (europe-west1) region. More information: Firebase Privacy
privacy_policy.section_4_2_1: Usage: Website usage statistics and user behavior analysis (only with consent)
privacy_policy.section_4_2_2: Data handling: According to Microsoft privacy guidelines
privacy_policy.section_4_3_1: Usage: Retrieval of Microsoft account information (name, email, profile picture)
privacy_policy.section_4_3_2: Data handling: Only minimal data necessary for login
privacy_policy.section_5_1_3: Local storage: Use of localStorage and sessionStorage
privacy_policy.section_5_text: Prior consent is required for the use of analytics cookies. When the website first loads, a cookie banner appears where you can accept or reject these cookies. Consent can be withdrawn at any time in the settings.
privacy_policy.section_6_title: 6. Who has access to the data?
privacy_policy.section_6_1_1: Students: Their own data, their class data, basic information of classmates
privacy_policy.section_6_1_2: Teachers: Their own data, their class data, basic information of students
privacy_policy.section_6_1_3: Parents: Their own data, their children's school data (if authorized)
privacy_policy.section_6_2_1: For certain features (e.g., class profile), community members can collaboratively edit content
privacy_policy.section_6_2_2: Class profile content is visible to class members
privacy_policy.section_6_3_1: Firebase (Google) services for data storage and processing
privacy_policy.section_6_3_2: Microsoft Clarity (only with consent) for usage statistics
privacy_policy.section_6_3_3: These providers handle data according to their own privacy policies
privacy_policy.section_7_title: 7. How do we protect your data?
privacy_policy.section_7_1_1: Authentication: All logins occur through authenticated Microsoft, Google, or Apple accounts
privacy_policy.section_7_1_2: Encryption: Data transmission and storage occurs through encrypted connections (HTTPS/TLS)
privacy_policy.section_7_1_3: Firebase Security Rules: Strict access control for data
privacy_policy.section_7_2_1: We strictly limit access to data
privacy_policy.section_7_2_2: Only authorized persons have access to data
privacy_policy.section_7_2_3: We conduct regular training on data protection
privacy_policy.section_7_3_1: We only collect data necessary for service operation
privacy_policy.section_7_3_2: We regularly review data collection and delete unnecessary data
privacy_policy.section_8_intro: According to the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:
privacy_policy.section_8_1: Right of access: You can request a copy of your data
privacy_policy.section_8_2: Right to rectification: You can request correction of incorrect data
privacy_policy.section_8_3: Right to erasure: You can request deletion of your data (if there is no legal basis for further storage)
privacy_policy.section_8_4: Right to restriction: You can request restriction of processing of your data
privacy_policy.section_8_5: Right to data portability: You can request transfer of your data in a structured, commonly used format
privacy_policy.section_8_6: Right to object: You can withdraw your consent to analytics cookies at any time
privacy_policy.section_8_7: Right to lodge a complaint: You can file a complaint with the data protection authority
privacy_policy.section_8_contact: To exercise your rights, write to the following email address: turoczi.adam@europa2000.hu
privacy_policy.section_9_1: User account data: While the account is active, or until deletion
privacy_policy.section_9_2: Community content: Until the user deletes it, or until account deletion
privacy_policy.section_9_3: Analytics data: Maximum 26 months (if consent is given)
privacy_policy.section_9_4: Local storage (localStorage): Until the user deletes it, or until browser cache is cleared
privacy_policy.section_9_text: When the account is deleted, all personal data is deleted, except those that legal obligation (e.g., accounting data) or legitimate interest (e.g., security logs) requires to be retained.
privacy_policy.section_10_text1: EU2K Hub is primarily used in a school environment where students are generally under 14 years old. It is important that parents and teachers are aware of data handling. A school account is required to use the platform, which is under the supervision of the school.
privacy_policy.section_10_text2: If we handle data of children under 14, the joint consent of the school and parents is required. For any questions, please contact the school or the contact person below.
privacy_policy.section_11_intro: If you have questions about data protection or wish to exercise your rights, write to us:
privacy_policy.section_11_authority_intro: Data protection authority: If you feel that the handling of your data violates data protection laws, you can file a complaint with the National Authority for Data Protection and Freedom of Information (NAIH):
privacy_policy.section_11_authority_details:
NAIH:
Address: 1055 Budapest, Falk Miksa utca 9-11.
Phone: +36 1 391 1400
Email: ugyfelszolgalat@naih.hu
Web: www.naih.hu

terms_of_service.section_1_text: Welcome to EU2K Hub! EU2K Hub is the digital center of Európa 2000 Gimnázium, created for students, teachers, and interested parties. By using the platform, you accept these terms of service. Please read this document carefully before using the service.
terms_of_service.section_2_1_1: School account required: A school account (Microsoft, Google, or Apple) is required to use the platform
terms_of_service.section_2_1_2: User types: The platform supports three user types: student, teacher, and parent
terms_of_service.section_2_1_3: Account security: You are responsible for the security of your account. Do not share your password or login credentials with others
terms_of_service.section_2_2_1: Students: Can access their own data, their class data, YouHub, Event Hub, and other community features
terms_of_service.section_2_2_2: Teachers: Can access their class data, their students' basic information, and create and manage events
terms_of_service.section_2_2_3: Parents: Can access their children's school data (if authorized), and receive notifications about important information
terms_of_service.section_2_3_text: If the system detects misuse (e.g., a student logging in with a parent account), we reserve the right to modify the account type, send notifications, or even restrict functions. Any form of system exploitation is prohibited and will result in punishment.
terms_of_service.section_3_1_1: You may only use the platform for lawful and school purposes
terms_of_service.section_3_1_2: It is prohibited to use or obtain others' accounts
terms_of_service.section_3_1_3: It is prohibited to circumvent the security of the system or network
terms_of_service.section_3_1_4: It is prohibited to distribute viruses, malware, or other harmful software
terms_of_service.section_3_2_2: Harassment, threats, or abuse of any kind is prohibited
terms_of_service.section_3_2_3: Discrimination, hate speech, or offending others is prohibited
terms_of_service.section_3_2_4: Spam, advertising, or unsolicited content is prohibited
terms_of_service.section_4_1_1: Responsibility: You are responsible for all content you upload or share on the platform
terms_of_service.section_4_1_2: Prohibited content: It is prohibited to upload content that violates others' rights, is illegal, or offensive
terms_of_service.section_4_1_3: Intellectual property: Only upload content you have rights to
terms_of_service.section_4_2_text: We reserve the right to delete, modify, or remove any content that violates these terms or platform rules at any time. Repeated violations may result in account suspension or deletion.
terms_of_service.section_5_1_text: The EU2K Hub platform, design, logo, and all related content are the intellectual property of Európa 2000 Gimnázium and EU2K Devs. Use of the platform does not grant rights to copy, distribute, or modify the content.
terms_of_service.section_5_2_text: Content uploaded to the platform remains your property. However, by using the platform, you grant permission to display, store, and manage the content to the extent necessary for the platform to function.
terms_of_service.section_6_1_text: The platform is provided "as is". We do not assume responsibility for continuous availability, error-free operation, or data loss. The service may be temporarily unavailable due to regular maintenance and updates.
terms_of_service.section_6_2_text: The platform may contain content created by third parties (e.g., events, courses). Only the creator is responsible for such content. The Hub, the school, and the platform developers do not assume responsibility for such content.
terms_of_service.section_6_3_text: You are responsible for your use of the platform and all activities conducted through your account. You are personally liable for violations or breaches of these terms.
terms_of_service.section_7_text: We reserve the right to modify, update, or discontinue the platform or any part of it at any time. We will notify users of significant changes, but we do not assume responsibility for the availability of previous features.
terms_of_service.section_7_beta: Important: The platform is currently in beta version. This means features may change, errors may occur, and full support is not yet available.
terms_of_service.section_8_1_text: You may request deletion of your account at any time through settings or by contacting us. After account deletion, all personal data will be deleted, except for those required to be retained by legal obligations or legitimate interests.
terms_of_service.section_8_2_text: In case of serious violations or breaches of these terms, we reserve the right to immediately suspend or delete the account without prior notice. In such cases, the user is not entitled to refund or compensation.
terms_of_service.section_9_text: We reserve the right to modify these terms of service at any time. We will notify users of significant changes via email or through the platform. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the modifications.
terms_of_service.section_10_intro: If you have questions about the terms of service or wish to report a violation, write to us:
terms_of_service.section_10_response: We will try to respond to all questions or reports within 48 hours.

silent_mode_desc: While you are at school, sound will not follow notifications.
push_notifications_desc: Push notifications are quick, pressure-like notifications appearing in the top right corner of your screen.
silent_mode_popup_desc:
With this button you can turn off silent mode for today.

It seems you are in school hours, so notifications might be disturbing.

If you still turn it off, it's a good idea to mute your device during classes.
silent_mode_popup_confirm: Turn off silent mode for today

Names: public/users/nevek/{userId} - The name field contains the displayName value

Pictures: public/users/profilePictures/{userId} - Contains the useProvidedPfp, pfpColor, and profilePictureUrl fields
